# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Environments
.venv/
venv/
env/
ENV/
*.env

# Distribution / packaging
.eggs/
dist/
build/
develop-eggs/
eggs/
lib/
lib64/
parts/
sdist/
var/
wheels/
share/cache

# Django stuff:
*.log
*.pot
local_settings.py
db.sqlite3

# Media files
/media/*
!/media/.gitkeep

# Static files
/static/*
!/static/.gitkeep

# Database stuff:
*.sqlite3
*.sqlite3-journal

# Uploaded Files
/uploads/*

# OS generated files #
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# VS Code files
.vscode/

# PyCharm files
.idea/

# Other
*.swp  # Swap files
*~ # Backup files
*.bak # Backup files

# Data files (if you don't want to track them)
*.csv

# Secret keys (VERY IMPORTANT - NEVER commit these!)
secret_key.txt
